content.original: This is 3 Plasma Cannons with a single rapid feeding mechanism that fails to properly create the plasma and mostly just lobs hot plastic at whatever is infront of it.... I know Pirates are known to imbibe but you gotta stop bringing me this stuff Boss! Uses Plasma Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: This is 3 Plasma Cannons with a single rapid feeding mechanism that fails to properly create the plasma and mostly just lobs hot plastic at whatever is infront of it.... I know Pirates are known to imbibe but you gotta stop bringing me this stuff Boss! Uses Plasma Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 这是3个等离子加农炮和一个单一的快速供弹机,不能正确地产生等离子并且大多数情况下只是把一团热的等离子扔到前面的东西上....我知道海盗们都是酒鬼,但你别再给我拿这些东西了,老板! 使用等离子弹药. 不稳定!

content.original: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield.
content.prevOriginal: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield.
content.content: 中型激光的重量轻,且据有相当大的伤害.因此,在战场上的大多数单位上都至少装备一台.

content.original: So Some gouzaizi thought he cracked how to make a Star League Grade Engine Shielding. If this doesn't blow up your mech when it breaks, it surely will boost the engine. There is a note etched into the main board that says ''Suck It Yang''.
content.prevOriginal: So Some gouzaizi thought he cracked how to make a Star League Grade Engine Shielding. If this doesn't blow up your mech when it breaks, it surely will boost the engine. There is a note etched into the main board that says ''Suck It Yang''.
content.content: 所以一些狗仔子认为他破解了如何制造一个星联发动机屏蔽罩的秘密.如果它在再坏的时候把你炸上天,它肯定能很好的加速引擎.主面板上刻着一条留言,上面写着''吸吧--杨''.

content.original: So Some gouzaizi thought he cracked how to make a Star League Grade Engine Shielding. If this doesn't blow up your mech when it breaks, it surely will boost the engine. There is a note etched into the main board that says ''Suck It Yang''.
content.prevOriginal: So Some gouzaizi thought he cracked how to make a Star League Grade Engine Shielding. If this doesn't blow up your mech when it breaks, it surely will boost the engine. There is a note etched into the main board that says ''Suck It Yang''.
content.content: 所以一些狗仔子认为他破解了如何制造一个星联发动机屏蔽罩的秘密.如果它在再坏的时候把你炸上天,它肯定能很好的加速引擎.主面板上刻着一条留言,上面写着''吸吧--杨''.

content.original: Converts an SHS engine to PDHS. PDHS Cooling System. The Radical Heat Sink System, increases the ability of the heat sink to flush excess heat much like Coolant Pods. Radical Heat Sinks, however, can fail through repeated use, especially if used continuously.
content.prevOriginal: Converts an SHS engine to PDHS. PDHS Cooling System. The Radical Heat Sink System, increases the ability of the heat sink to flush excess heat much like Coolant Pods. Radical Heat Sinks, however, can fail through repeated use, especially if used continuously.
content.content: 将单散热器(SHS)引擎转换为海盗双层散热器(PDHS)模式,机甲的海盗双层冷却系统.激进(Radical)散热器系统提供了像冷却液舱一样的清除余热的能力.然而激进散热器重复时使用有失效的可能,特别是连续使用的情况下.
激进海盗双层散热器套件(P)
海盗双层散热器套件件(C)

content.original: Some knucklehead 'engineer' got the wise idea to weld some spikes to some extra armor plating and put it on a mech's feet. Then promptly wrecked the mech falling over.
content.prevOriginal: Some knucklehead 'engineer' got the wise idea to weld some spikes to some extra armor plating and put it on a mech's feet. Then promptly wrecked the mech falling over.
content.content: 一些愚蠢的“工程师”想出了一个聪明的主意,把一些钉子焊接到一些额外的装甲板上,然后把它安装在机甲的脚上.然后迅速摧毁倒下的机甲.

content.original: Need an ECM but don't want to bother some Liao Sales rep for one of theirs? We at QuicSell got your back! Our lightweight EWS 6000X can do everything theirs can do for only half the price!
content.prevOriginal: Need an ECM but don't want to bother some Liao Sales rep for one of theirs? We at QuicSell got your back! Our lightweight EWS 6000X can do everything theirs can do for only half the price!
content.content: 需要一个ECM,但不想为他们的一个麻烦一个廖家族的销售代表?我们在QuicSell支持你!我们的轻量级EWS 6000X可以做到EWS一切可以做的,并且只有一半的价格！

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM护罩单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息
增加 视野/传感器效率/健康.

content.original: Soo yeah, this is essentially an Armored Cowl, nicely reinforcing the Head Seaction, but it has been welded and shaped to look like a massive Atlas Sized Tricorne! There's even straps for a Full Odessan Raxx Leather Eyepatch....
content.prevOriginal: Soo yeah, this is essentially an Armored Cowl, nicely reinforcing the Head Seaction, but it has been welded and shaped to look like a massive Atlas Sized Tricorne! There's even straps for a Full Odessan Raxx Leather Eyepatch....
content.content: 是的,这本质上是一个装甲前围,很好地加强了头部姿态,经过焊接成型,看起来像一个适配Atlas大小的的三角帽!甚至有完整的敖德桑Raxx皮革眼罩的带子....

content.original: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.prevOriginal: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.content: 基本上仍是电子对抗措施(ECM),可以干扰敌人的瞄准和导弹系统,但不太优雅,因为它只是在任何可能的频率上发送古老的重金属摇滚,而不是红外和磁...

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: Some delusional pirate's idea of what a minesweeping sensor should look like. It is unclear how it works, but somehow it can find nearby mines...and granite? Also, for some reason it plays some strange pop-opera over the 15 kHz local area radio making its source much easier to detect.
content.prevOriginal: Some delusional pirate's idea of what a minesweeping sensor should look like. It is unclear how it works, but somehow it can find nearby mines...and granite? Also, for some reason it plays some strange pop-opera over the 15 kHz local area radio making its source much easier to detect.
content.content: 一些经常妄想的海盗对扫雷传感器是什么样子的想法.目前还不清楚它是如何工作的,但不知何故,它可以找到附近的地雷...和花岗岩?此外,出于某种原因,它在15千赫的本地电台上播放一些奇怪的流行歌剧,这使得它的更容易被发现.

content.original: Some joker has taken a standard articulated Battlemech hand, loaded it with scrap metal, welded it shut, then liberally covered it with six and a half inch spikes. Effective? Certainly, but rather inelegant. MELEE HAND ACTUATOR. Disables Arm Mounted Weapon Bonus.
content.prevOriginal: Some joker has taken a standard articulated Battlemech hand, loaded it with scrap metal, welded it shut, then liberally covered it with six and a half inch spikes. Effective? Certainly, but rather inelegant. MELEE HAND ACTUATOR. Disables Arm Mounted Weapon Bonus.
content.content: 一些小丑拿了一只标准的铰接式战斗机甲手部,用废金属装满它,焊接它,然后用六英寸半的尖刺盖住它.有效吗?当然有效,但相当不优雅.近战手部执行器。禁用臂装武器加成。
